Description:
Regularly update and maintain product listings, pricing, and inventory levels on the Shopify platform.
Monitor and resolve any technical issues, bugs, or errors that may arise on the website.
Create, edit, and optimize website content, including product descriptions, images, banners, and promotional materials.
Ensure all content is up-to-date, accurate, and aligned with the brand's tone and style.
Conduct regular website audits to identify opportunities for improving the user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance.
Implement SEO best practices to enhance organic search rankings and drive more organic traffic to the site.
Analyze and interpret website analytics to make data-driven decisions and recommendations for website improvements.
Assist customers with inquiries related to the website, product availability, order status, and general support issues.
Evaluate and integrate third-party apps and plugins to enhance website functionality and meet specific business needs.Skills
Skills:
Experience in managing Shopify websites and a strong understanding of the Shopify platform.
Familiarity with website analytics tools, SEO practices, and e-commerce optimization techniques.
Bachelor’s degree (the higher the person’s academic attainment the better).
Related certifications highly preferred.
